item.title: Report X-2025020366
item.description:
Report X-2025020366

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-13T06:18:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-05
  • City: LOUISVILLE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A LEAKING AIR PACKAGE. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED TWELVE FLAMMABLE CANS OF RAINBOW ZINC COLD GALVANIZE AEROSOLS, EACH AT 14 OZ. ONE CAN LEAKED DUE TO A RUPTURE IN THE BOTTOM SEAM OF THE CAN. OUTER BOX IS UN SPECIFICATION PACKAGING WITH TWO WHITE AVERY LABELS DESCRIBING THE PRODUCT INCLUDING SMALL LETTERING OF A PARTIAL PROPER SHIPPING NAME, AEROSOL CANS. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS SHIPPING PAPERS, MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX.

item.title: Report X-2025020146
item.description:
Report X-2025020146

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-08T03:31:42+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-01
  • City: LOUISVILLE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: ONE AIR PACKAGE CONTAINING A FULLY REGULATED DANGEROUS GOODS WAS FOUND LEAKING AT THE UPS WORLDPORT FACILITY IN LOUISVILLE, KENTUCKY. DURING PACKAGE INSPECTION THERE ARE EIGHT CONTAINERS OF 1.8 LITER CELL WASH SOLUTION I / NA0H-D WITH ONE LEAKING FROM THE CLOSURE. THE OUTER BOX IS UN SPECIFICATION PACKAGING WITH A CAO, DIAMOND LABEL, PSN, UN NUMBER, AND AN APPROPRIATE SHIPPER'S DECLARATION FOR DANGEROUS GOODS. THE PACKAGE HAD PREVIOUSLY PASSED AN ACCEPTANCE AUDIT AT THE ORIGIN FACILITY.
